quote: There is a shade of red for every woman.
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: Like a compass needle that points north a mans accusing finger always finds a woman. Always.
author: Khaled Hosseini

quote: I am my own woman.
author: Evita Peron

quote: For the first time she could see a mans head naked of its skull. Saw the cunning thoughts race in and out through the caves and promontories of his mind long before they darted through the tunnel of his mouth.
author: Zora Neale Hurston

quote: A woman knows a skirt-chaser.
author: Alveda King

quote: Heed my words daughter if you ever mean to be happy Never give yourself to a man.
author: Donna Woolfolk Cross

quote: God bless ladies with costly tasteful clothes and touching dirty fingernails that champion gifted foreign poets and decorate the library in beautiful melancholy fashion  My God this universe is nothing to snicker at
author: J.D. Salinger

quote: I have a hundred reasons to dislike this gentleman Erica reminded herself aloud. And a thousand reasons more not to go courting with any man.Lavinia laughed at that. Whenever has a womans heart listened to her head
author: Davis Bunn

quote: When a woman conceives her true self a miracle occurs and life around her begins again.
author: Marianne Williamson

quote: she is the only woman Ive ever known who could make a man call.Ever
author: Sophie Kinsella

quote: A woman who would steal your love when your love was really all you had to give was not much of a woman.
author: Stephen King

quote: It was woman that taught me cruelty and on woman therefore I have exercised it.
author: Walter Scott

quote: No she was just a woman. And that meant she could feel she could need she could give and she could receive.
author: Laura Lee Guhrke

quote: Give a man a noble cause and he would fight to the death for what he believed inbut get the woman he loves to leave him and his once honourable principles would cease to be quite so important.
author: Mike Gayle

quote: A woman who acts like a fool is a fool.
author: Arthur Golden

quote: Do you believe a man can truly love a woman and constantly betray herNever mind physically but betray her in his mindin the very poetry of his soul.Wellits not easy but men do it all the time.
author: Mario Puzo

quote: The Queen is coming to reclaim her girls.
author: Marianne Williamson

quote: The naked womans body is a portion of eternity too great for the eye of man.
author: William Blake

quote: She had been born with a different name to a woman with laughing eyes and warmly whispered words of love whod died degraded and afraid on a misty Irish morning.
author: C.S. Harris

quote: If you arent the woman I think you are then this isnt the world I thought it was.
author: Arthur Golden

quote: I have never worked for a woman, and I have never worked with a lot of women.
author: Sheryl Sandberg

quote: A man to whom a woman cannot look up she cannot love. Yet it is marvelous how a woman contrives to find something to look up to in a man.
author: Arnold Haultain

quote: After all inside every woman no matter how grown up she is there is still a frightened little girl.
author: Sergei Lukyanenko

quote: A strange girl all phosphorous and cantharides burning with every desire And burning with every vice
author: Jean Lorrain

quote: There was a Being whom my spirit oftMet on its visioned wanderings far aloft.A seraph of Heaven too gentle to be humanVeiling beneath that radiant form of woman....
author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quote: Her fragrance blew him off and his body followed steps he had never learnt in his life.
author: Faraaz Kazi

quote: The sign of a true woman isnt the ability to recite French poetry or play the pianoforte or cook Chateaubriand. The sign of a true woman is learning to listen to her own voice even when society does its best to drown it out.
author: Eve Marie Mont

quote: I am a woman above everything else.
author: Jackie Kennedy

quote: I told Ella Mae Cheeks Johnson then age 105 that she was the only person over 80 who Id ever met who never referred to her physical infirmities or health problems. To which she replied I have my difficulties I do not rejoice in them.
author: Patricia Mulcahy

quote: Theres little of the melancholy element in her my lord she is never sad but when she sleeps and not ever sad then for I have heard my daughter say she hath often dreamt of unhappiness and waked herself with laughing.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: A womans dress should be like a barbedwire fence serving its purpose without obstructing the view.
author: Sophia Loren

quote: Then may I tell you that the very next words I read were these  Chloe liked Olivia Do not start. Do not blush. Let us admit in the privacy of our own society that these things sometimes happen. Sometimes women do like women.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: A woman without a past is like a fruitcake without brandyinsipid Aunt Augusta in Aunt Dimity and the Family Tree.
author: Nancy Atherton.

quote: She gave me a pain in the ass but she was very good looking.
author: J.D. Salinger

quote: We like the wrong sorts of girls they wrote.  They are usually the ones worth writing about.
author: Catherynne M. Valente

quote: Well if manners maketh man makeup maketh woman.And we dont need a phalanx of behavioural scientists to explain why man judge women by their looks.Because the see bether than thay think.
author: Kathy Lette

quote: Being a woman I tried I cared I loved and blamed in return.
author: Priyanka Bhowmick

quote: It is the same woman I know for she is always creeping and most women do not creep by daylight.
author: Charlotte Perkins Gilman

quote: Every woman should have a purse of her own.
author: Susan B. Anthony

quote: A womans mistakes are different from a girls
author: Janet Fitch

quote: No man ever truly possesses a woman anyhow said Gidas moodily. He has her body for a time if hes lucky but only the most fleeting glimpse into her soul. Gidas was a poet or wanted to be.
author: Guy Gavriel Kay

quote: Im a woman. We mature faster than men remember
author: Sharon Sala

quote: When a woman rises up in glory her energy is magnetic and her sense of possibility contagious.
author: Marianne Williamson

quote: Her name is Denise and she has green eyes and red hair. Well this week. Last week her hair was dyed blonde and she had blue eyes. Or maybe that was a different woman. I dont know. All I know is that she is my soul mate.
author: Jarod Kintz

quote: A woman cannot ever be sure of not being married till she is buried Mrs. Doctor dear and meanwhile I will make a batch of cherry pies.
author: L.M. Montgomery

quote: Is there any creature on earth as unfortunate as an ugly woman wonders Lady Catelyn Stark
author: George R.R. Martin

quote: The true genius of a Woman is her subtle flair in creating the illusion that you are the smart one
author: Josh Stern

quote: Let me first state forthright that contrary to what weve often read in books and heard from preachers when you are a woman you dont feel like the Devil.
author: Orhan Pamuk

quote: 101 Reasons Why its great to be a woman  We have three times the amount of potential sick leave. Take into account all those days you are unable to work owing to pre during and post menstrual tension.
author: Summersdale Publishers

quote: She will not be simple and sweet.She will not be what people tell her she should be.
author: E. Lockhart

quote: A woman is the full circle. Within her is the power to create nurture and transform.
author: Diane Mariechild

quote: You can be two things if youre a woman Dolores. Betty Crocker or a floozy. Just remember your place  even if it kills you.
author: Wally Lamb

quote: And still youll hesitate to tell him wont you  Why  Because youre a woman  Is your destiny such a small thing then  To keep your legs open and your mouth shut
author: David Hewson

quote: Find a woman who makes you feel more alive. She wont make life perfect but shell make it infinitely more interesting.  And then love her with all thats in you.
author: Gayle G. Roper

quote: For a man to think he can fulfil his destiny without a woman is a misunderstanding a miscalculation it is reckless and folly. Certainly a woman is not everthing but everything depends on her.
author: Yasmina Khadra

quote: Majority of women like to fantasize and men like to romanticize. I saw a painful mountain in her eyes.
author: Santosh Kalwar

quote: A pleasurable woman could cause more harm than miserable one.
author: Santosh Kalwar

quote: Old people who have felt blows and toil and known the worlds hard hand need even more than children do a womans tenderness.
author: Willa Cather

quote: It is not a woman I want - it is all women.
author: Henri Barbusse

quote: Dishonesty in a woman is a thing younever blame deeply.
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quote: Woman must come of age by herself  she must find her true center alone.
author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quote: I see myself..in those pages as she goes back and forth enjoying simply enjoying the beauties of the moments then chastising herself for having no edge being simple and worse harmless.
author: Michael Cunningham

quote: Men need to be needed. When we are needed we feel powerful. We thrive on helping a woman who needs us.
author: C.T.

quote: Where I was raised a womans word was law. I aint quite outgrowed that yet.
author: Zane Grey

quote: Henry was thinking of the younger Holland sister of the way she could go from being an impetuous girl to a knowing woman in a few seconds and never lose the stars in her eyes.
author: Anna Godbersen

quote: After all its not every day a woman is given a kingdom of dreams.
author: Judith McNaught

quote: Every poem is an infant labored into birth and I am drenched with sweating effort tired from the pain and hurt of being a man in the poem I transform myself into a woman.
author: Jimmy Santiago Baca

quote: I cant decide whether Im a good girl wrapped up in a bad girl or if Im a bad girl wrapped up in a good girl. And thats how I know Im a woman
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: I have sometimes thoughtthat under the affectation of independent views you are as enslaved to the social code as any woman I know
author: Thomas Hardy

quote: Each time a woman stands up for herself without knowing it possibly without claiming it she stands up for all women.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: When a woman teams up with a snake a moral storm threatens somewhere.
author: Stacy Schiff

quote: I think a great book title would be Ida Says I do in Idaho. It would be about a divorce in Washington State and the protagonist would be a woman though Im not sure what her name should be.
author: Jarod Kintz

quote: Una rosa se despert en su sangre y ensombreci sus mejillas. Un agitado aliento separ los ptalos de sus labios que temblaron. Sobre ella sopl algn viento sur de pasin y movi los delicados pliegos de su vestido
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Oh what a silly Thing is Woman  How vain how unreasonable
author: Jane Austen

quote: Man who hates cats is insecure but a man who likes them is one worth keeping. If he can appreciate a cat he can appreciate a strong independent woman.
author: Larissa Ione

quote: But not she. Her eternity is an article of her faith. Great wars and disasters can ebb and flow races rise and fall empires wither with suffering and death but these are superficialities she woman is perpetual essential she will go on for ever.
author: John Wyndham

quote: She expressed an opinion that the happiness of a woman in Paradise is beneath the soles of her husbands feet he enlightened humorously seemingly not at all averse to her obvious desire to be comforted.
author: Margaret Rome

quote: Look for the heart in a man before you look at what he has.
author: Jonathan Anthony Burkett

quote: Only a Woman divine could know all that a woman can suffer.
author: Willa Cather

quote: What is a womans greatest virtuePatience.
author: India Edghill

quote: Its womans power food is. You be sure you know wheren the hook is before swallerin it Dru. You mind me now.
author: Lili St. Crow

quote: Our kingdom is our life and our life is our kingdom. We are all meant to rule from a glorious place. When God is on the throne then so are we. When God is in exile our lands are at war and our kingdoms are in chaos.
author: Marianne Williamson

quote: When a man however passively becomes an obstacle to the fulfillment of a womans desires he becomes an odious thing in  her eyes  or will given time enough.
author: Theodore Dreiser

quote: She might have acted like she didnt know.But she knewa woman always knows
author: D Lowery

quote: Id never been a good damsel in distress. I was a handson damsel.
author: Jennifer Armintrout

quote: A woman is like a tea bag. You never know how strong she is until she gets in hot water.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Marrying a woman who was reckless must have been the ultimate reckless act requiring a lifetime of balancing to keep both of them safe
author: Ursula Hegi

quote: When I meet a woman whose energy falters at the first barriershe seems to fade beside my mother.
author: Andrew Sean Greer

quote: All you need to build a house Is blood and bricks and plaster.
author: Harriet Jones

quote: I think that gay marriage is something that should be between a man and a woman.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: Im a dyslexic dancer. Instead of leading the women I follow. Quick cab driver follow that woman
author: Jarod Kintz

quote: You cant go through life striking out at people who hurt or scare you. All that does is show them that youre weak. It tells them that theyve wounded you and a strong woman never shows her wounds unless it serves a purpose.
author: Lisa Cach

quote: They say a womans loyalty only lasts as long as it takes her to hang up and dial again.
author: Kim Gatlin

quote: I never saw Death before and now I seeThat it is warring eyes in a womans form.
author: Thiruvalluvar

quote: A WOMAN SHOULD HAVE ..... a set of screwdrivers a cordless drill and a black lace bra...
author: Pamela Redmond Satran

quote: A man can sleep around no questions asked but if a woman makes nineteen or twenty mistakes shes a tramp.
author: Joan Rivers

quote: 101 Reasons why its great to be a womanWe have an excuse to justify an inordinate indulgence in bitchiness Its clearly feminine intuition.
author: Summersdale Publishers

quote: To be a princess is to play at life. To be a queen is to be a serious player...The purpose of life as a woman is to ascend to the throne and rule with heart.
author: Marianne Williamson

quote: They came to her naturally since she was a woman all day long with this and that one wanting this another that the children were growing up she often felt she was nothing but a sponge sopped full of human emotions.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: I aint the only old woman looking. Im just the only one honest enough to admit it. The others just hire the boy to cut their grass so they can sit at the window and drool.
author: Glines Abbi

quote: A woman is the full circle. Within her is the power to create nurture and transform.
author: Diane Mariechild

quote: You can be two things if youre a woman Dolores. Betty Crocker or a floozy. Just remember your place  even if it kills you.
author: Wally Lamb

quote: And still youll hesitate to tell him wont you  Why  Because youre a woman  Is your destiny such a small thing then  To keep your legs open and your mouth shut
author: David Hewson
